header.title: Trustless Crypto Finance
header.lead1: Alice offers savings and loan at fixed interest rates
header.lead2: Deposit DAIs and get FREE ALICE token every 24hours!

services.title: Features
services.service1.title: Savings - 8% APR
services.service1.desc: Deposit stable coins and get annual interest of 8% continuously.
services.service2.title: Instant Loan - 3 seconds
services.service2.desc: Borrow stable coins instantly with the lowest interest rate. Coins are offered instantly.
services.service3.title: Exchange - Reliable
services.service3.desc: Can you trust centralized exchanges? Blockchain secures your assets safely.
services.service4.title: ALICE Token - Free
services.service4.desc: Get free ALICE token every 24 hours proportional to your saved DAIs!

features.feature1.title: Secured by blockchain
features.feature1.desc: Alice is backed by its own blockchain. It protects your assets at the highest level of security.
features.feature2.title: Intuitive and convenient
features.feature2.desc: It offers the best user experience for trading, borrowing and lending assets.
features.feature3.title: Super performant
features.feature3.desc: DPoS consensus algorithm, which operates Alice's blockchain, provides both security and performance.

contentFirst.title: DAI Savings of Fixed Interest Rate
contentFirst.desc: Alice offers savings to help you increase your assets most effectively. Deposit DAI stable coins and get 8% of APR every year. There's no limit to the amount of deposit and you can withdraw any amount at any time you want! (APR : Annual Percentage Rate)

contentSecond.title: Loan Backed By Collateral
contentSecond.desc: With Alice, you can get a loan in less than 3 seconds. First, deposit tokens as collateral which you believe whose price will increase. Then, you will get paid for your DAI stable coins. Use your DAI and pay it back whenever you want!

contentThird.title: Exchange with Reliability
contentThird.desc: Your crypto assets are more important that anything else. Can you really trust centralized exchanges while depositing your assets ? On Alice you don't have to trust anyone. Blockchain technology secures your assets from any threats.

subscription.title: Reservation
subscription.desc: Reserve now and get the benefit of savings of 8% ARP. DAI savings open at late May 2019.
